text: @realDonaldTrump Soooo, "harass" ur ships-is that like what"fake news" does to u? If they hurt ur feelings u'll try to destroy them? If ships become annoying u'll destroy them & begin a war?  Haven't u lost enough American lives so far due to Covid-19 u want to lose more needlessly-for ratings.
